alert.note: Alert for Butler; Conecuh; Covington; Crenshaw; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 5:12AM CDT until May 06 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Butler County in south central Alabama... Southern Crenshaw County in south central Alabama... Northeastern Escambia County in south central Alabama... Southeastern Conecuh County in south central Alabama... Northern Covington County in south central Alabama... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 512 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of McKenzie to 10 miles east of Evergreen to 9 miles southwest of Red Level to 17 miles southeast of Castleberry, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Andalusia, Opp, Luverne, Brantley, McKenzie, River Falls, Red Level, Rutledge, Dozier, Heath, Gantt and Glenwood. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
